section-3.preselection-desc: Identifying and building a pool of qualifying individuals with the aid of local knowledge.
section-3.preselection-1-desc: We've committed to focusing our efforts on the most vulnerable, ensuring our aid delivers the biggest impact where it’s most needed.
section-3.preselection-2-desc: One of the highest concentrations of people in need is in Sierra Leone, where 57% of the population lives under the poverty line and the typical monthly earnings are below USD 45.
section-3.preselection-3-title: Creating a Pool of Potential Recipients
section-3.preselection-3-desc: We partner with local NGOs dedicated to poverty alleviation to identify those in need, building a large, scalable pool of potential beneficiaries.
section-3.preselection-3-annex: 5000+ potential beneficiaries currently in the pool, which can be scaled up.
section-3.selection-desc: Making sure our selection process is bias-free, transparent to all, and avoids favoritism.
section-3.selection-1-desc: When faced with making a choice, the lottery stands out as fair and unbiased approach. This is especially true when all options are equally desirable.
section-3.selection-1-annex: Selecting from individuals, all of whom stand to benefit.
section-3.selection-2-desc: A lottery’s integrity depends on its unpredictability. Confidence grows when people know it's purely by chance, without manipulation and publicly verifiable.
section-3.selection-2-annex: The newest random number operating our lottery.
section-3.selection-3-desc: By publishing the source code that operates the random selection, we empower everyone to verify the process and ensure there is no manipulation.
section-3.selection-3-annex: Review our source code. Verify our draws below.
